Hey!
I’m Christian MacMillan, a 30 y/o islander and developer with 10+ years of experience with a keen interest in design, motion and interaction. Over those years my work has been recognised in Awwwards, FWA, The Webby Awards, Cannes Lions or WiReD. Currently based in Barcelona, I work at B-Reel for companies and brands such as Google, Netflix, LVMH, Nike or Gorillazz.
However, in-between those monstars, I’m always looking for small side projects where innovation and exploration are a must.
